thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Namikaze420

author: Namikaze420
title: Namikaze420
text:
The company do makes a lot of effort to please its customers but due to the fact its still small, it can't make it up to all.
I do recommend the company for the products it offers causes the items are in great shape and comes with quite good packaging which ensures that the items are not damaged.
Very nice people to tackle with issues with a very good response rate and comes with a good solution.
